title: Was Kamala Harris Called ‘Hoe’ on Car Dealer’s Billboard?
subtitle: The sign was referring to the California U.S. senator who made history as the first Black woman on a major political party's presidential ticket.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2020, a car dealership in Massachusetts erected a billboard referring to 2020 U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden and his vice-presidential nominee, Kamala Harris, as "Joe and the Hoe."
